refinement.text: Gain a -value0-% Elemental DMG Bonus for every element and receive the might of Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a -value1-% Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

refinement.text: ATK is increased by -value0-%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to -value1-% of ATK and dealing -value2-% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

Increases Shield Strength by -value0-%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by -value1-% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Crit Rate increased by -value0-%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to -value1-% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases DMG by -value0-%. When the character wielding this weapon triggers Elemental Reactions, they gain a Sigil of Rebellion. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field.When you possess 2 Sigils of Rebellion, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" increases Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG by -value1-% and increases ATK by -value2-%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Rebellion for 20s.Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.
HP increased by -value0-%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on -value1-% of the wielder's Max HP.

Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals -value0-% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.
Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by -value0-%.Additionally, regenerates -value1-% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.
Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by -value0-%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

refinement.text: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a -value0-% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every -value1-s.
Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by -value0-%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.
On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by -value0-% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates -value0- Energy for each seed consumed.

refinement.text: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by -value0-% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by -value1-%.
CRIT hits have a -value0-% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every -value1-s.
Elemental Skill DMG is increased by -value0-% of DEF. The effect will be triggered no more than once every 1.5s and will be cleared 0.1s after the Elemental Skill deals DMG.
After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by -value0-% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by -value0-%.
On hit, has 50% chance to deal -value0-% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every -value1-s.
Using an Elemental Burst grants a -value0-% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.
Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by -value0-% for 12s.
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by -value0-%.
Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores -value0-% HP.
